Privacy Policy

Your Privacy is Our Priority

Information We Collect

We collect personal information that you provide to us, such as your name, email address, and the images you upload for processing. We also collect usage data to improve our AI-powered services.

How We Use Your Information

We use your information to provide and improve our AI-powered headshot services, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our platform. Your images are processed using our AI technology to create professional headshots.

Data Security

We implement robust security measures to protect your data, including encryption and secure cloud storage. Our AI-enhanced security protocols ensure GDPR compliance and data protection.

Your Rights

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt-out of marketing communications at any time.

AI-Specific Privacy Considerations

Our AI models are designed with privacy in mind. We do not use your personal images to train our AI models. All AI-generated headshots are created specifically for you and are not stored or used for any other purposes without your explicit consent.

See AIFacePro in Action
